articles.title: Interplay co-founder and pioneering game developer Rebecca Heineman dies at 62 - Ars Technica
articles.description: The gaming community mourns a beloved mentor and LGBTQ+ advocate with a storied career.

articles.title: Trump picks new CFPB director amid efforts to close agency - Politico
articles.description: The nomination of Stuart Levenbach was a "technical" maneuver intended to extend White House budget director Russ Vought's oversight of the agency.
articles.content: His ability to serve as the acting CFPB head was set to expire in December under the Vacancies Act, which typically limits such acting appointments to 210 days but extends that period if the presiden… [+1967 chars]

articles.title: What to know about the F-35 fighter jet that Trump is selling to Saudi Arabia - NPR

articles.title: TikTok will now give you badges for limiting your doomscrolling - TechCrunch
articles.description: TikTok is adding new digital well-being tools like an affirmation journal, a background sound generator, and badges for using the app within limits.
